# Keyword trend

```{python}
import networkx as nx
from pubmed import explorer
from Bio import Entrez
import pandas as pd
import hvplot.pandas
e = explorer.Explorer()

Entrez.email = 'layediouf535@gmail.com'
e.query("cell", 2010, 2022)

e_search_df = e.search_info_csv("cells", 2015, 2022)
```
```{python}
df = e_search_df
df["date"] = pd.to_datetime(df["date"])
df["year"]  = df["date"].dt.year 
```
## Trends Tree

```{python}

df.groupby("year").count().hvplot.bar(x="year", y="pmid", rot=90, title="Number of publications per year")

```
